choreography.description: Calm, peaceful facial expression with relaxed posture
choreography.reasoning: Establishes the sad/relaxed mood of the piece. Sets contemplative atmosphere for introspective opening.

choreography.description: Slow, rhythmic side-to-side swinging motion like a pendulum
choreography.reasoning: Low energy movement matches intro section. Pendulum motion reflects melancholic, meditative quality. Highly danceable (0.96) but low energy (0.00) suggests slow, controlled execution.

choreography.description: Gentle side-to-side swaying with minimal vertical movement
choreography.reasoning: Completes intro with smooth, relaxed motion. Fills remaining intro time while maintaining low-energy aesthetic.

choreography.description: Contemplative pose with head slightly tilted, introspective expression
choreography.reasoning: Emotional transition into main section. Reinforces the sad/relaxed mood and high danceability contrast.

choreography.description: Smooth, undulating body motion combining sway with gentle rolling movements
choreography.reasoning: High danceability (0.96) demands groovy, flowing motion. Sway and roll captures the relaxed yet highly danceable paradox of the track.

choreography.description: Head tilting side-to-side with gentle rolling neck motion
choreography.reasoning: Maintains main section groove while offering directional variety. Medium energy execution suits the moderate intensity portion.

choreography.description: Alternating side-to-side head movements with slight shoulder rotation, playful peeking motion
choreography.reasoning: Introduces subtle playfulness while maintaining sad/relaxed emotional framework. High danceability supports repeated cycles at 98.7 BPM.

choreography.description: Sharp, precise snapping motions with angular joint articulation on beat
choreography.reasoning: Provides rhythmic punctuation. Grid snap adds mechanical precision that contrasts with flowing movements, creating dynamic variation while respecting the 98.7 BPM structure.

choreography.description: Peaceful, composed expression with neutral relaxed posture
choreography.reasoning: Mid-main emotional beat reinforces the relaxed mood before final section build.

choreography.description: Basic vertical nodding motion at moderate tempo
choreography.reasoning: Wind-down movement leading toward conclusion. Simple nod provides grounding, repetitive comfort element.

choreography.description: Neutral resting position with minimal motion, gentle breathing
choreography.reasoning: Fills final seconds with contemplative stillness. Returns to serene baseline, matching the sad/relaxed/low-energy aesthetic throughout the entire 30-second piece.
